headline: GE Aerospace Set to Report Q4 Earnings: Is a Beat in the Offing?

headline: Chris Hohn Posts Biggest Hedge Fund Gain Ever at $18.9 Billion. How He Did It.
summary: The founder of TCI Fund Management ranks No. 1 for the net gain achieved in 2025, according to a ranking from the investment firm Edmond de Rothschild.

headline: Did GE's (GE) Engine Overhaul and Delta GEnx Deal Just Recast Its Aviation Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent weeks, GE Aerospace has announced leadership changes consolidating its commercial engines and services operations under Mohamed Ali, secured a major GEnx engine and long-term services agreement with Delta Air Lines for Boeing 787-10 aircraft, and continued to feature prominently in industry conferences and earnings-season commentary. These developments highlight how GE Aerospace is tightening operational control across the engine lifecycle while deepening customer relationships,...

headline: Jim Cramer on GE Aerospace’s Earnings: “I Can’t Imagine It’ll Be Anything Other Than Spectacular”
summary: GE Aerospace (NYSE:GE) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s game plan for this week.
